attributes.action: Nigel Farage to be honoured for his tireless work to restore power to back to UK
attributes.background:
Nigel Farage has worked tirelessly for many years to reverse the powers by the un-elected bureaucrats in Brussels.

Without the work and dedication, we would not be on the path to regain our freedom.

If Cliff Richard can be knighted... then I'm damn sure Nigel Farage deserves to become a Sir.

rejection.details:
Please refer to the following website for information about how the honours system works:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
